name: Penny Panda Ponders People
description:
This is my entry for the No Words gamejam, a two day long gamejam where you can't have any words!

... Also the theme ended up being "mankind", but I'd already decided the protagonist would be a panda, so it's a game about a panda figuring out what a mankind is!

Made in Ren'py.
All music is by Jonny Easton at https://www.youtube.com/user/jonnyboyveseer !
